yona:1:1: Yona yanga gutumwa, umuyaga ubakubira mu nyanja1.Ijambo ry’Uwiteka ryaje kuri Yona mwene Amitayi riramubwira riti
yona:1:2: 2.“Haguruka ujye i Nineve wa murwa munini, uwuburire kuko ibyaha byabo birundanije bikagera imbere yanjye.”
yona:1:3: 3.Ariko Yona arahaguruka ngo acikire i Tarushishi, ahunge Uwiteka. Amanukana i Yopa abona inkuge ijya i Tarushishi, maze atanga ihoro, ajya mu nkuge ngo ajyane n’abandi i Tarushishi, ahunge Uwiteka.
yona:1:4: 4.Maze Uwiteka yohereza umuyaga mwinshi mu nyanja, mu nyanja haba ishuheri ikomeye inkuge yenda kumeneka.
yona:1:5: 5.Abasare baterwa n’ubwoba, umuntu wese atakambira ikigirwamana cye, ibintu bari batwaye mu nkuge babijugunya mu nyanja ngo boroshye inkuge. Ariko Yona we yari mu nkuge hasi cyane, aryamye yisinziriye.
yona:1:6: 6.Nuko umutware w’inkuge aza aho ari aramubaza ati “Wabaye ute wa munyabitotsi we? Byuka utakire Imana yawe, ahari Imana yawe yatwibuka ntiturimbuke.”
yona:1:7: 7.Bose baravugana bati “Nimuze dufinde tumenye utumye dutezwa ibi byago.” Nuko barafindura, ubufindo bwerekana Yona.
yona:1:8: 8.Baherako baramubaza bati “Tubwire utumye dutezwa ibi byago. Ukora murimo ki? Uraturuka he? Uri uwo mu kihe gihugu? Uri bwoko ki?”
yona:1:9: 9.Arabasubiza ati “Ndi Umuheburayo nubaha Uwiteka Imana yo mu ijuru, yaremye inyanja n’ubutaka.”
yona:1:10: 10.Maze abantu bafatwa n’ubwoba bwinshi baramubaza bati “Ibyo ukoze ibi ni ibiki?” Kuko abo bagabo bari bamenye ko ahunze Uwiteka, kuko yari abibabwiye
yona:1:11: 11.baramubaza bati “Tugire dute ngo inyanja iduturize?” Kuko inyanja yiyongeranyaga kwihinduriza.
yona:1:12: Yona amirwa n’urufi12.Arabasubiza ati “Nimunterure munjugunye mu nyanja, na yo irabaturiza, kuko nzi yuko iyi shuheri yabateye ari jye ibahora.”
yona:1:13: 13.Ariko abo bagabo baragashya cyane ngo basubire hakurya imusozi ariko ntibabibasha, kuko inyanja yiyongeranyaga izikuka ikababuza.
yona:1:14: 14.Ni cyo cyatumye batakira Uwiteka bakavuga bati “Turakwinginze Uwiteka, turakwinginze twe kurimbuka tuzira ubugingo bw’uyu muntu, kandi ntudushyire mu rubanza rw’amaraso y’udacumuye, kuko ari wowe Uwiteka ukoze icyo ushaka.”
yona:1:15: 15.Nuko baterura Yona bamujugunya mu nyanja, inyanja iratuza.
yona:1:16: 16.Maze abo bagabo baherako batinya Uwiteka cyane, bamutambira igitambo, bahiga imihigo.
yona:2:1: 1.Uwiteka ategeka urufi runini rumira Yona, maze Yona amara mu nda y’urufi iminsi itatu n’amajoro atatu.
yona:2:2: Yona asengera mu nda y’urufi2.Maze Yona asengera Uwiteka Imana ye mu nda y’urufi ati
yona:2:3: 3.“Nagize ibyago ntakira Uwiteka aransubiza, Nahamagariye mu nda y’ikuzimu, Wumva ijwi ryanjye.
yona:2:4: 4.Kuko wanjugunye imuhengeri mu nyanja, Umwuzure warangose, Ibigogo byawe n’imiraba yawe byose byarandengeye.
yona:2:5: 5.Ndavuga nti ‘Nciwe imbere yawe, Ariko nzongera kureba urusengero rwawe rwera.’
yona:2:6: 6.Amazi yarantwikiriye angera ku bugingo, Imuhengeri harangose, Urwuya rwanyizingiye mu mutwe.
yona:2:7: 7.Ndamanuka njya mu mizi y’imisozi, Isi n’ibihindizo byayo binkingira ibihe byose, Ariko unkurira ubugingo muri rwa rwobo, Uwiteka Mana yanjye.
yona:2:8: 8.Ubwo umutima wanjye wiheberaga mu nda nibutse Uwiteka, No gusenga kwanjye kwakugezeho mu rusengero rwawe rwera.
yona:2:9: 9.Aberekeza umutima ku bitagira umumaro by’ibinyoma, Baba bimūye ubababarira.
yona:2:10: 10.Ariko jyeweho nzagutambira igitambo n’ijwi ry’ishimwe, Kandi nzahigura umuhigo wanjye, Agakiza gaturuka ku Uwiteka.”
yona:2:11: 11.Nuko Uwiteka ategeka urufi ruruka Yona imusozi.
yona:3:1: Yona yongera gutumwa i Nineve1.Maze ijambo ry’Uwiteka rigera kuri Yona ubwa kabiri riramubwira riti
yona:3:2: 2.“Haguruka ujye i Nineve wa murwa munini, uwuburire imiburo nzakubwira.”
yona:3:3: 3.Nuko Yona arahaguruka ajya i Nineve nk’uko Uwiteka yamutegetse. Kandi Nineve wari umurwa munini cyane, kuwuzenguka rwari urugendo rw’iminsi itatu.
yona:3:4: 4.Yona atangira kujya mu mudugudu, agenda urugendo rw’umunsi umwe ararangurura ati “Hasigaye iminsi mirongo ine Nineve hakarimbuka.”
yona:3:5: 5.Maze ab’i Nineve bemera Imana, bamamaza itegeko ryo kwiyiriza ubusa, bose bakambara ibigunira uhereye ku mukuru ukageza ku uworoheje hanyuma y’abandi.
yona:3:6: 6.Ijambo rigera ku mwami w’i Nineve ahaguruka ku ntebe ye y’ubwami, yiyambura umwambaro we yambara ibigunira, yicara mu ivu.
yona:3:7: 7.Ategekana itegeko n’abatware be b’intebe baryamamaza i Nineve bati “Umuntu wese ye kugira icyo asogongeraho, kandi amatungo y’amashyo n’imikumbi bye kurisha kandi bye kunywa amazi,
yona:3:8: 8.ahubwo abantu n’amatungo byose byambare ibigunira, abantu batakambire Imana bakomeje, kandi bahindukire umuntu wese areke inzira ye mbi, bareke n’urugomo bagira.
yona:3:9: 9.Nta wubizi ahari aho Imana yahindukira ikigarura, ikareka uburakari bw’inkazi yari ifite ntiturimbuke!”
yona:3:10: 10.Imana ibonye imirimo yabo, uko bahindukiye bakareka inzira yabo mbi irigarura, ireka ibyago yari yabageneye ntiyabibateza.
yona:4:1: Yona arakazwa n’uko Imana ibabariye i Nineve1.Ariko ibyo bibabaza Yona cyane ararakara,
yona:4:2: 2.asenga Uwiteka ati “Uwiteka, si icyo navugaga nkiri iwacu? Ni cyo cyatumye nshoka mpungira i Tarushishi, kuko namenye ko uri Imana igira ubuntu n’imbabazi, itinda kurakara, ifite kugira neza kwinshi kandi yibuza kugira nabi.
yona:4:3: 3.None rero Uwiteka, ndakwinginze unyice kuko gupfa bindutiye kubaho.”
yona:4:4: 4.Uwiteka aramubaza ati “Ubwo urakaye ubwo ukoze neza?”
yona:4:5: 5.Nuko Yona asohoka mu murwa yicara iruhande rwawo aherekeye iburasirazuba, aba ari ho aca ingando ayicaramo ari mu gicucu, ategereza kureba uko umurwa uzamera.
yona:4:6: 6.Uwiteka Imana itegeka uruyuzi rumera aho Yona yari ari ngo rumutwikire, rumubere igicucu ku mutwe, rumukize umubabaro yari afite. Maze Yona ararunezererwa cyane. +
yona:4:7: 7.Bukeye bwaho Imana itegeka inanda irya urwo ruyuzi, bucya rwarabye.
yona:4:8: 8.Maze izuba rivuye Uwiteka ategeka umuyaga wotsa w’iburasirazuba, izuba ryica Yona mu mutwe bituma yiheba, yisabira gupfa aravuga ati “Gupfa bindutiye kubaho.”
yona:4:9: 9.Uwiteka aramubaza ati “Ukoze neza ubwo urakajwe n’uko uruyuzi rwumye?” Aramusubiza ati “Nkoze neza kurakara, ndetse byatuma niyahura.”
yona:4:10: 10.Uwiteka aramubaza ati “Ubabajwe n’uruyuzi utihingiye kandi utamejeje, uruyuzi rwameze ijoro rimwe ku rindi rukuma?
yona:4:11: 11.Jyewe se sinari nkwiriye kubabazwa n’i Nineve uwo murwa munini, urimo abantu agahumbi n’inzovu ebyiri basaga batazi gutandukanya indyo n’imoso, hakabamo n’amatungo menshi?”
